citation.article-title: Pseudidiomarina marina sp. nov. and Pseudidiomarina tainanensis sp. nov. and reclassification of Idiomarina homiensis and Idiomarina salinarum as Pseudidiomarina homiensis comb. nov. and Pseudidiomarina salinarum comb. nov., respectively
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Pseudidiomarina homiensis (Kwon et al. 2006) comb. nov.
Pseudidiomarina homiensis (ho.mi.enâ€²sis. N.L. fem. adj. homiensis referring to the Homi Cape in Korea, where the type strain was isolated).
Basonym: Idiomarina homiensis Kwon et al. 2006.
The description is the same as that given for Idiomarina homiensis by Kwon et al. (2006).
